text:
A few days after the live stream
from the beach by the local heroes.

The heroes' joyful appearance, including in the beach flag,
had generally received favorable responses.

name: Tourist
text:
So this is Enoshima~!
It was closer than I thought.
Let's go to that beach right away!

name: Tourist
text:
Let's do that!
Maybe we'll even meet the heroes
who are here for the photoshoot!

name: Saotome
text:
Sniffle, sniffle...
To think visitors would come
from outside the island like this...

Saotome, seeing the occasional tourists,
began to sob, overwhelmed with emotion.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you so much...!
This is also thanks to you helping me, [Player]-kun.

options.text: How many times has he broken down crying now!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry, sorry.
As I get older, my tear ducts get loose.
But...

name: Saotome
text:
With this, surely,
Enoshima can regain its former glory...!

name: Saotome
text:
Thank you, truly...
Astar-kun, Yohack-kun.
And you, [Player]-kun...!

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san...
I understand how you feel, but
if you shout too loudly...

name: Tourist
text:
Did somebody say the heroes' names?
Could it be, those people over there are—

name: Tourist
text:
—Oh, it's true!
Isn't that Astar-san and Yohack-san!?

Tourists, whose attention was drawn by Saotome's appearance
and who noticed the heroes' presence,
rushed towards them with a charging momentum.

name: Tourist
text:
Um...!
If it's not too much trouble,
could I get an autograph!?

name: Tourist
text:
I saw the beach flag! Your figures during the competition
were incredibly cool, and
I've become a huge fan!

name: Astar
text:
A-An autograph...?
I don't have such value—

name: Yohack
text:
—Of course, it's fine!
Here, Astar-san, please take a pen!
Um, where should I sign?

name: Tourist
text:
I want you to write both your names
big and bold on my shirt!

name: Astar
text:
What...?
They want me to write my name,
not "Santa-san"...?

name: Yohack
text:
I see, I completely understand!
Then I'll write our autographs
perfectly here!

Yohack, with a smile, offered a helping hand
to Astar, who was awkward in his response.
And then—

name: Tourist
text:
—Thank you very much!
I'm looking forward to the calendar!

name: Yohack
text:
You're welcome!
You two, please enjoy
Enoshima to the fullest~!

name: Astar
text:
...Sorry, Yohack.
I caused you trouble.

name: Yohack
text:
No, no, don't worry about it!
Rather, wasn't I being too nosy...?

options.text: Astar, are you not good at fan service?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm...
I have "some" knowledge when it comes to dealing with people as "Santa-san"...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text: But when it comes to responding as "myself", it's difficult to know how to behave.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm also secretly nervous, you know?
But if I get flustered, the other person would be troubled, so...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: I try my best to respond as cheerfully as possible!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even so, I do get overwhelmed quite often...!

text:
Amidst such conversation,
Shiratori hesitantly called Saotome.

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san.
We need to go to the next place soon...

name: Saotome
text:
Oh, that's right!
Now that I've left the beach to Kiloc and the others,
we need to continue with the calendar production!

—Last night.
Saotome and Shiratori
were checking their devices.

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh!?
Sales of EnoRail tickets
are gradually increasing!

name: Shiratori
text:
The number of visitors to the beach
is also steadily increasing.
However...

name: Shiratori
text:
At this number,
it might be a bit difficult to handle
with the current staff.

name: Shiratori
text:
There aren't that many village office staff
or village volunteers, so...

name: Alend
text:
In that case, we'll
be in charge of patrolling the beach.
That should cover the numbers, right?

name: Senthak
text:
That's a great idea, Alend-kun!
Let's have [Player]-kun and the others
rest here for a while!

name: Joezen
text:
That's right!
If we're on standby at the beach,
I think we can handle any unforeseen circumstances.

name: Astar
text:
There's no need for that.
We'll also handle the beach—

name: Senthak
text:
Now, now, don't say that!
Astar-kun, you and the others have been handling
the event preparations all along!

name: Joezen
text:
Yohack-san and [Player]-san
have been working non-stop since coming to Enoshima, right?

name: Joezen
text:
Leave this to us!
We also want to repay you for going ahead.
Right, Captain!

name: Kiloc
text:
Th-That's right!
Just relax as if you're on a big ship!
Yohack, [Player]-chan!

name: Yohack
text:
If Joezen-kun and Kiloc-san
say that much,
then understood!

name: Yohack
text:
Well then,
I'll leave the beach
to everyone!

Once the plan was settled,
Alend spoke thoughtfully.

name: Alend
text:
Even so,
to receive this much attention
just for being a hero.

name: Senthak
text:
It's not just because he's a hero,
I think it's just Alend-kun's efforts so far
taking visible form!

name: Senthak
text:
If the person you're supporting
participates in an event,
you'll rush there no matter what!

name: Kiloc
text:
Hm, wait a minute...?
If a lot of fans come
specifically for "us" (heroes)—

name: Kiloc
text:
Then there must be people who are infatuated with me.
If I cast my line in such a place,
it'll be a feeding frenzy...!?

name: Kiloc
text:
I can't just stand here!
The beach, my dream harem!
They're calling me! Ehehehe...!

name: Joezen
text:
—You bastard of a Captain!
Don't make foolish plans to slack off,
hurry up and go to your post!

name: Kiloc
text:
Ow, ow, Joezen!!
Don't pull your dear father's ear!?

Yohack and Astar, who remained on the spot,
had children gathered around them again.

name: Yohack
text:
...Joezen-kun and Kiloc-san told us
to rest, but time is limited, you know.

name: Astar
text:
We can't just rest.
There must be more we can do.

name: Astar
text:
Even though attention is gathering on Enoshima,
it's relying on hero popularity.

name: Astar
text:
To grant Saotome's wish,
we need to make people feel the charm of
Enoshima itself through the event.

options.text: That's what the calendar is for, right?

name: Saotome
text:
E-Everyone...!
You're already working more than enough...!

While trying to calm Saotome, who, far from stopping his tears,
was crying even more vigorously at [Player]'s words—

[Player] and the others
resumed exploring Enoshima
to continue calendar production.

name: Yohack
text:
So, um,
where are we heading next?

name: Astar
text:
According to this tourist map,
Enoshima Observatory seems to be the closest.

options.text: Is it the one we got the other day?

name: Saotome
text:
This is a special map I made
for when visitors come to Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
I compiled Enoshima's photogenic spots
into a handmade map!

name: Shiratori
text:
On the back of the map,
you can stamp it.

name: Shiratori
text:
We've set up stamps at each point,
so it might be a good idea to collect them.

name: Yohack
text:
I see!
So it means you can take commemorative photos
while collecting stamps!

name: Astar
text:
In other words, a stamp rally.
Indeed, it might be a rational approach
to make an impression of Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
Right, right!
And the closest one from here is
just as Astar-kun said—

name: Saotome
text:
Look, there's a slightly
unusual building
over there, isn't there?

Looking where Saotome pointed,
a building with a different atmosphere from other houses
came into [Player]'s sight.

name: Astar
text:
That dome-shaped building, huh.
It stands out quite a lot compared to other houses.

name: Yohack
text:
That's right.
It looks more like a base
than an observatory.

name: Saotome
text:
You're very perceptive, Yohack-kun!
Although it's just an observatory now—

name: Saotome
text:
It used to be an observation base,
the center of Enoshima's development.

name: Huckle
text:
Yes. It's a very small inhabited island,
so its notoriety is low. It's located just before
the Boso Peninsula, where Chiba is.

name: Huckle
text:
Among the areas near South Kanto,
the damage from monsters was minor, and
it once gained fame as an observation base—

options.text: President said something like that too...

name: Saotome
text:
...I'll talk about the rest
at the observatory, since we're here!

name: Saotome
text:
I could explain it verbally, but
like they say, seeing is believing!

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san.
You haven't forgotten the contents
to explain to them, have you?

When [Player] looked up,
a narrow slope continued to the observatory.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san.
If you're tired, I'll carry you on my back to the observatory!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yohack-kun is so energetic...
If I carried a small child on my back, my knees would buckle just from that...

options.text: It looks like a nice walk!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Hmph.
Judging by that relaxed expression, those days weren't wasted after all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You do know a lot.
As [Player]-san said, there used to be an escalator.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text: It was abolished a long time ago because it wasn't profitable in Enoshima, where both visitors and residents were decreasing.

text: And the group arrived at Enoshima Observatory.

In addition to the panoramic view,
various measuring instruments and computers
caught [Player]'s eye.

name: Yohack
text:
As Saotome-san said,
there are remnants of an observation base
in various places.

name: Astar
text:
Multiple antennas and large PCs, huh.
The equipment looks quite professional,
what were they observing here?

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun seems to have
already guessed it, but...

name: Saotome
text:
This was a frontline base for observing
the monsters of South Kanto.

name: Saotome
text:
It was before I was born, but
the entire South Kanto region
was attacked by monsters.

name: Saotome
text:
Fortunately, Enoshima, being an "isolated island",
barely escaped the monster damage, but...

name: Saotome
text:
Someone had to observe where the monsters,
who destroyed what was said to be Japan's largest city,
would attack next.

name: Yohack
text:
Monsters, the largest city...
S-So that's what happened.

name: Astar
text:
If such an incident occurred,
it makes sense that a dedicated base would be built.

Astar and Yohack showed a bit of surprise
after hearing Saotome's explanation.

options.text: Yohack-san is from Clouge, after all.

name: Saotome
text:
...To get back to the topic, Enoshima at that time
was the best possible location for observing
the monsters of South Kanto.

name: Shiratori
text:
That's why survivors from South Kanto and
researchers visiting the observation base gathered,
and it gradually grew into a large settlement...

name: Saotome
text:
That's how it is.
This is the origin of Enoshima Village,
a small municipality incorporated into Chiba Prefecture.

name: Saotome
text:
When I was young,
there were still many people
living in Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
Friends from childhood,
neighbors who were like family.
Colleagues who sweated together at the village office.

name: Saotome
text:
I never doubted that I would continue
to live happily with my comrades in Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
But those days
didn't last forever.

name: Saotome
text:
No matter how much we observed the monsters,
they showed no signs of moving outside
South Kanto.

name: Saotome
text:
It was as if they were being drawn
towards the direction of Point Yh, the bigwigs
at the time said.

name: Saotome
text:
Following the survey results,
the researchers took the lead, and
the islanders gradually decreased.

name: Saotome
text:
Although it's dozens of kilometers away, nearby
there's also Orient City, a larger frontline base
for heroes.

name: Saotome
text:
If the urgency is low,
there's no need to stay in Enoshima
and continue observing at the frontline.

options.text: It's a difficult problem, isn't it?
Hmm... There might be some truth to that...

name: Saotome
text:
It's understandable that people think that.
In reality, the monster activity
has completely calmed down.

name: Shiratori
text:
For the islanders at that time,
the observation base aspect was
Enoshima's advantage.

name: Shiratori
text:
If that advantage is lost,
it's understandable that they would feel
inconvenienced by Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
...That's right. I can't deny that
cities with everything available
are easier to live in.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Hey, Dad.
Takeru-kun is moving.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
I don't like that, Dad.
We started talking at school, and recently
we've become closer than ever.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Hey, Dad, please ask them too.
Takeru-kun's mom and dad.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Don't leave Enoshima.
Let's stay together forever...!

He understood his son's feelings painfully well.
Just as he understood that he couldn't do anything about it.

name: Saotome
text:
...Yuto.
I understand your feelings very well.

name: Saotome
text:
It's not that your dad
doesn't want to stop them.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
R-Right!
Dad thinks so too, right!
Then—

name: Saotome
text:
—But, you know,
where and how someone lives
is their own freedom.

name: Saotome
text:
If Takeru-kun's parents
decided to leave Enoshima,
I can't stop them.

At that time, Saotome was confided in by parents
of children the same age as his son, about their anxieties
regarding their children's future and job prospects.

He couldn't irresponsibly console them, and
he considered it his own fault as a village office staff member
that he couldn't remove their worries.

However, Saotome was aware that he wasn't
the kind of person who could give up on everything
just because of that—

name: Saotome
text:
—So, Yuto. So that you don't feel
that lonely in the future,
this is what I'm thinking.

name: Saotome
text:
Let's make Enoshima a more enjoyable place,
a wonderful place where everyone will want to keep living!

name: Saotome
text:
I didn't want the place I live in
to be thought of as having no future,
or being the harbor of boredom.

name: Saotome
text:
Especially for the children!
I don't think it's something to be happy about
if they can't love their hometown.

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
For the sake of the children, huh.

name: Yohack
text:
To want to make your hometown more enjoyable,
I think that's a wonderful idea!

name: Astar
text:
The event's start is not bad.
If we continue to work diligently,
we should achieve corresponding results.

name: Shiratori
text:
...And, attention commensurate with the results
will gather on this isolated island.

name: Shiratori
text:
The revitalization of Enoshima is important, but
we cannot neglect preparations for the risks
that come with it.

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun, you were worried about
the same thing before, weren't you?
But, didn't you research it with me at that time?

name: Saotome
text:
There are no examples, at least in Japan,
of a large number of monsters appearing due to an increase
in tourists from village revitalization...

name: Saotome
text:
This local hero project was carefully
planned after thorough research.
I'm sure it'll be fine!

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san and Shiratori-san,
you truly care deeply
about Enoshima.

name: Astar
text:
...In that case,
both must be fulfilled.

name: Yohack
text:
I completely understand!
We'll definitely liven up Enoshima...

name: Yohack
text:
And even if monsters appear,
if we work together to defeat them,
it'll be a complete solution!

options.text: It's also our job, after all!

name: Saotome
text:
Thank you!
Well then, let's start taking pictures
and continue with the calendar production—

The moment Saotome was about to speak,
the notification sound of a device rang out.

name: Alend
text:
[Player], Saotome,
can you hear me!?

name: Alend
text:
It's an emergency.
Monsters have appeared on the beach.
And not just one or two.

name: Senthak
text:
We're trying to defeat them,
but there are too many...
It's getting a bit tough!

Through the device screen,
multiple monsters could be seen on the beach.

name: Joezen
text:
I'm worried about the village too, but
we can't leave the beach right now
with evacuation guidance and monster subjugation!

name: Kiloc
text:
There's no guarantee monsters won't appear there!
[Player]-chan and the others,
please handle the village!

options.text: Leave the response here to me!

text:
Receiving [Player]'s words,
the heroes threw themselves back into battle.

name: Saotome
text:
N-No way...
To think such a number of monsters
would appear at once...

name: Saotome
text:
I certainly researched it!
The safety of this project, that village revitalization
would not be detrimental to Enoshima Village—

In Saotome's flustered mind,
his conversation with Shiratori
a few days ago resurfaced.

name: Shiratori
text:
...Enoshima has never gathered
this much approval before.
At least, not in my memory.

name: Shiratori
text:
I hope this excitement
doesn't provoke the monsters...

name: Saotome
text:
Given Enoshima's local characteristics,
history proves that monsters tend to appear
a little more often.

Remembering his own words from a few days ago,
Saotome collapsed to his knees, and
muttered weakly with a stunned expression.

name: Saotome
text:
Oh no...! If only I had taken
Shiratori-kun's words more seriously...!

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san... No.
With only the information we had,
we couldn't have predicted this situation.

name: Astar
text:
Calm down, Saotome.
What you should be doing now
is not regretting or reflecting.

name: Yohack
text:
While we're standing here,
Enoshima Village might be
under attack by monsters.

name: Astar
text:
All we can do now is
do our best with what we have.

name: Yohack
text:
Astar-san is right.
The places where monsters tend to appear,
and the areas that are dangerous without evacuation...

name: Yohack
text:
No one knows them better
than you yourself, Saotome-san.

name: Saotome
text:
Enoshima...
Protect it from monsters...

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san.
Can you stand?

Repeating [Player]'s words,
Saotome, though unsteady, stood up
with the help of Shiratori's shoulder.

name: Saotome
text:
Th-That's right.
If I just hang my head here,
it won't solve anything...

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone...
I'm sorry, but please lend me your strength.

name: Saotome
text:
Please, help me
protect Enoshima...

name: Astar
text:
Of course.
Now, let's hurry, Saotome.

name: Yohack
text:
If we combine our strengths,
I'm sure we can manage!

name: Yohack
text:
Perhaps Enoshiman-san
has already gone ahead!

name: Saotome
text:
Th-That's right.
Enoshiman will surely
come running too.

name: Shiratori
text:
Believing that,
let's hurry to the village too.

Together with Saotome, who somehow managed to stand up,
the group started running towards Enoshima Village.

And [Player] was quietly
whispered to by Shiratori.

name: Shiratori
text:
Everyone are truly heroes.
No matter what difficulties you face,
you stand up and face forward the next moment.

name: Shiratori
text:
Truly...
You are strong and kind people.

Unable to finish their sentence,
[Player] fell silent.

name: Shiratori
text:
...[Player]-san.
You are truly as kind as they are.

On the way, only [Player] realized that
Shiratori was heading to the village via a different route.

Chapter 4:
Shine, Enoshiman!
And, when the group arrived at Enoshima Village—

name: Monsters
text: Zuzuzu...!

name: Islander
text:
Wh-What's going on...!?
To think so many monsters would appear...!

name: Islander
text:
They've even appeared outside the village!
At this rate, there's nowhere to run!

name: Tourist
text:
Wait a minute!
Is Enoshima Village
this dangerous!?

Numerous monsters that appeared in the village
were surrounding the islanders.

And, one monster crept towards a child,
and opened its large mouth wide.

options.text: At this distance, I won't make it...!

name: Island Kid
text:
Help me!
Enoshiman!!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Hah-hah-hah!
As long as there are calls for help,
I will always appear—

name: Saotome
text: Th-That voice!?

A voice heard from nowhere,
rushed in as swiftly as a shadow,
and crushed the monster with a sharp blow.

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Local hero
Enoshiman, has arrived!

options.text: As flashy an entrance as ever!

name: Island Kid
text:
Enoshiman!
Thank you for helping us!

name: Island Kid
text:
Since Enoshiman came,
everything will be alright now!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Hah-hah-hah!
No need for thanks,
as long as I am the local hero!

name: Enoshiman
text:
More importantly, you all,
do you remember our promise?

name: Island Kid
text: When Enoshiman fights—

name: Island Kid
text: —Take one step back and cheer!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Very good!
Now, let's defeat the monsters!

Enoshiman, who said that and clenched his fist,
faced a number of monsters far greater than before.

name: Saotome
text:
Sorry, everyone...!
Please help Enoshiman...!

options.text: You two, can you do it?

name: Yohack
text:
Of course!
We won't let Enoshiman-san
fight alone!

name: Astar
text:
...Let's do it, [Player].
We must teach these monsters who are
getting too carried away a lesson.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Yohack-kun, Astar-kun!
And you, [Player]-kun!
Thank you for your assistance!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Now, let's repel the monsters together!
If we combine our strengths,
victory surely awaits!

options.text: Let's protect the people of Enoshima!

name: Yohack
text:
Understood, [Player]-san!
Please handle the operation!

name: Astar
text:
I'll deal with the immediate threat.
—Here I come!
Battle Start

name: Astar
text:
—Tch.
They're tough.

name: Yohack
text:
We must have defeated quite a few already,
but they show no signs of calming down!?

name: Enoshiman
text:
These monsters this time
seem quite formidable...!

The heroes were repelling the monsters
that appeared in the village, but
their faces clearly showed fatigue.

However, the monsters' attacks relentlessly
assaulted everything in their path indiscriminately.

name: Tourist
text:
The monster is...!
The monster is coming this way!

name: Yohack
text: I'm coming to help now!

name: Island Kid
text:
I'm scared!
Help me!

name: Astar
text:
It's alright.
Hide behind me!

Fighting monsters while protecting villagers
in a place with poor visibility—

Was not an easy task
even for the heroes.

Even if they could defeat them one by one,
monsters appearing one after another
were cornering the heroes.

name: Enoshiman
text:
At this rate, we'll be worn down!
We have to do something—

—It was then.
An matured monster suddenly appeared
behind the group of tourists.

[Player], who instantly observed the monster's appearance,
immediately issued a warning.

name: Astar
text:
Leave it to me!
[Player]!

name: Yohack
text:
Thanks for the instructions!
At this distance—!

Yohack and Astar, who slipped in at the last moment,
were able to block the monster's attack.
However—

name: Tourist
text:
It's no use...!
If we don't run, we'll be killed!

The tourists, witnessing the terror of the monsters,
started running without knowing reason.

name: Monster
text: Zuzuzu...!

Monsters attacked
the isolated tourists.

name: Astar
text:
Tch!
They surrounded us, huh!

name: Yohack
text:
We have to somehow
block the monster's attack...!

The moment the adult monster's gigantic arm
was mercilessly swung down—

Yohack and Astar
took the attack with immense force
with their entire bodies.

However, due to the accumulated damage
from previous battles, they couldn't hold their ground
and were blown away.

name: Both
text: Ugh!

Enoshiman rushed over to the heroes,
who were rolling on the ground
with tremendous force.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Astar-kun!
Yohack-kun!
Are you two alright!?

name: Astar
text:
...Of course.
I'm not one to give up with this much.

name: Yohack
text:
I can still do it!
Until we properly protect
the people of Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
You two...!
You're so battered...!

Seeing the two heroes, who, despite taking damage,
declared they would protect the villagers—

name: Enoshiman
text:
Just as I thought...
You "heroes" would so easily...
If it's to protect someone!

Enoshiman was exuding intense emotions
from his entire body, unlike his usual self.

name: Enoshiman
text:
This cannot be allowed.
This must not happen.
Should heroes be harmed—

name: Enoshiman
text:
—That alone,
I absolutely cannot forgive.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Against several matured monsters.
In front of them, the children and Saotome-kun.

name: Enoshiman
text:
And,
the heroes who protected them
are already badly injured.

name: Enoshiman
text:
A miraculous move that can break
this situation is...!

Enoshiman analyzed the surrounding situation and
desperately thought of the best course of action.
However—

The monsters were slowly but surely
cornering the heroes and villagers.

In the fleeting moments of
the rapidly worsening battlefield,
Enoshiman derived the best possible solution.

name: Enoshiman
text:
...I see.
It seems this is all
I have left.

name: Enoshiman
text:
—As long as I am
"Enoshiman".

The next moment,
Enoshiman spoke in his usual tone,
while protecting the isolated tourists behind him.

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Astar-kun, Yohack-kun!
From here on, leave everything to me!

name: Enoshiman
text:
These monsters,
I, the local hero of Enoshima,
will eliminate them with everything I have!

options.text: Enoshiman, what are you going to do!?
How are you going defeat monsters of this strength...?

text:
Without answering [Player]'s question,
Enoshiman patted Yohack's shoulder.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Yohack-kun.
I sincerely respect your kindness and positivity.

name: Enoshiman
text:
You are not ignorant of pain,
but a hero with the strength to endure it.
Fighting alongside you, I truly felt that.

name: Yohack
text:
Enoshiman...-san...?
What on earth are you doing...?

name: Enoshiman
text:
Astar-kun.
Your unwavering will and strong body
are surely the fruits of tireless effort.

name: Enoshiman
text:
I am proud to have fought alongside you,
who possess a will to push forward towards your goal
and an unshakeable conviction.

name: Astar
text:
Enoshiman...!
You... no way...!

name: Enoshiman
text:
—And protecting Enoshima is
my mission as the local hero!

name: Enoshiman
text:
You who came to Enoshima
are naturally included among
those I must protect!

Enoshiman, having declared that,
turned his face towards [Player].

name: Enoshiman
text:
...[Player]-kun.
I want to ask you for an operation.

name: Enoshiman
text:
You, who perfectly handled your job
even in a sudden battle,
will surely be able to observe my technique.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Come on!
Pour your ViewPower into me!

Enoshiman called out to [Player]
in a strong, undeniable tone.

The urgency conveyed by his words
forced [Player] to make a choice.

options.text: Is that really the only way?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Time is of the essence.
At this rate, someone will surely be sacrificed.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text:
To prevent that, I need your strength.
Please, understand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Time is of the essence.
At this rate, someone will surely be sacrificed.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text:
To prevent that, I need your strength.
Please, understand.

options.text: That's the only way, isn't it...?

name: Enoshiman
text:
—[Player]-kun.
It was truly reassuring to have you
operating beside me.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Thank you very much for fighting
with me until now.

Enoshiman's body was enveloped in a dazzling light,
as he whispered softly, audible only to [Player].

name: Enoshiman
text:
To harm the people of Enoshima,
and the heroes any further—

name: Enoshiman
text:
I, Enoshiman, will not allow it!
Now, take this—!!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Enoshiman
Final Blade!!!

Emitting a dazzling glow from his entire body,
Enoshiman charged at the monsters.

And, a blinding light exploded,
and when it subsided—

name: Tourist
text:
We...
were saved...?

name: Island Kid
text:
Yay!
Enoshiman defeated the monsters!

name: Saotome's Son
text:
...But,
where is Enoshiman?

—Not only the monsters,
but Enoshiman's figure
had also vanished without a trace.

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Connection lost.
Cannot continue target operation.

note: So that explains why his Skill 3 was crossed out on Chapter 3's battle...

options.text: What was that technique just now...?

name: Saotome
text:
N-No way...
Enoshiman, along with the monsters...

name: Saotome
text:
Am I having
a bad dream...?

Muttering that,
Saotome slapped his own cheek.

However, the dull, throbbing pain
proved that the events before his eyes were real.

name: Saotome
text:
It's my...!
It's all my fault...!

Saotome slammed his tightly clenched fist
onto the ground with all his might.
Again and again.

His sorrowful murmur was drowned out
by the dull thud of his reddened fist
hitting the ground.
